meaningMnemonic: Let the <radical>sun</radical> shine into your <radical>ear</radical> while sitting on a <radical>stool</radical> and make sure <kanji>most</kanji> of it gets in your head. You want to fill your brain with the most sun anyone ever has.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Most</kanji> of this is for your <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい). You're testing out a new way to power it, but if you can't get most of the sun into your ear, it won't be enough to power most of the cyborg's robo-parts.
